amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, emergency funding for border security efforts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3594 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 39. Record Vote Number: 94.

action.text: Amendment SA 3594 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S3476-3483, S3492; text: CR S3477-3478; text as modified: CR S3492) To provide, with an offset, emergency funding for border security efforts.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3594 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3594 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 39. Record Vote Number: 94.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3594 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 39. Record Vote Number: 94.
